  1. Recent News

  1. Winter Weather Tips:

    Unhook all outside hoses from your house, and any lavatory or kitchen faucets you have on an outside wall. Leave your cabinet doors open. If you're in an older pier and beam house, or have poor insulation, you might want to leave your faucets dripping. Read on...

  2. HANDLING HAZARDOUS MATERIALS

    DO NOT DISPOSE OF USED OIL, ANTIFREEZE, PAINTS, AND OTHER HOUSEHOLD CHEMICALS IN RESIDENTIAL TRASH. Read on...

  3. Properly dispose of fat trimmings & cooking oil in the trash.

    Sewage back ups from clogged pipes can damage personal and public property, resulting in costly repairs. Read on...
